name: Csaba Szirják

introduction.en: I have been working at IT area since the beginning of 2000. I was working as a freelance software developer. Later I realized that I could use my skills and knowledge much better as a leader. Leadership is a perfect role for me to solve problems, develope systems and manage people at innovative areas. The difference is that now I not only develope applications, but also building teams. In 2015 I developed a boardgame (Startupper) for to-be leaders and managers, so I could introduce interested people to my profession playfully.
introduction.en_old: I have worked at IT area since early 2000. Initially I dealt with software development as freelancer. Later I realized that I could use better my acquired knowleadge as a leader. I have found really my passion in this role, because as IT leader I still have to solve problems and building systems at innovative areas. The difference is that now I not only develope applications, but also building teams. In 2015 I developed a boardgame (Startupper) for to-be leaders and managers, so I could introduce interested people to my profession playfully.
introduction.hu: Az informatika területén dolgozom 2000 eleje óta. Kezdetben fejlesztésekkel foglalkoztam szabadúszóként, majd rájöttem, hogy a megszerzett tudást sokkal jobban hasznosíthatom vezetőként. Ebben a szerepben találtam meg igazán önmagam, mert IT vezetőként továbbra is problémákat kell megoldanom és rendszereket fejlesztenem innovatív területeken. A különbség az, hogy most már nem csak alkalmazásokat, hanem csapatot is építek. 2015-ben a Startupper társasjátékot fejlesztettem leendő vezetőknek és menedzsereknek, hogy játékos formában tudjam a szakmát minél több érdeklődővel megismertetni.

motivation.en: I belive in continuous learning (KaiZen), therefore I not only teach myself, I try to inspire and coache others. I like the challenges, because I can get the most out of myself, I can be free, creative and feel effective and helpful.
motivation.hu: A folyamatos fejlődés (KaiZen) híve vagyok, ezért nem csak magamat, de másokat is arra ösztönzök, hogy folyamatosan tanuljanak. A kihívásokkal teli környezetet szeretem, mert itt tudom a legtöbbet kihozni magamból, itt szabadon alkothatok és ilyenkor érzem magam igazán hasznosnak.

good-ins: Automate the workflows, make them transparency
Find the right position/roles for the colleagues
Keep the project deadline and budget

work-experiences.description: Lead a 40-person software development team at 2 different locations (Budapest, Szombathely). The main profile of the team: develope stream base online applications and services and mobile apps. The company is the one of the fastest growing stock in the Hungarian Stock Exchange.

Lead a 15-person software development team at 3 different locations (Budapest, Miskolc, Debrecen). The main profile of the team: develope online applications and services. The company won 4-times the Deloitte Technology Fast 50 award.

Lead a 15-person softver and hardware development team. The company main profile: GPS tracking for cargo fleet. The company won 3-times the Deloitte Technology Fast 50 award and iData was The Intelligent Company of The Year 2014.
Kidney dialysis machine development for BBraun. Touchscreen browser base display with Java backend.
Webpages, online applications and TV competitions developing. Own PHP base framework design and implement.
